minecraft:written_book_content.title: The Cradle Beneath
minecraft:written_book_content.author: The Three Machina
pages:
The city stirs beneath stone and song.

The Heart Chamber wakes, unstable and hungry for order.

Three priests now stand as conduits of Stabilizing Power: Life, Earth, and Power.

Gather emerald, diamond, and amethyst.

Trade with the priests for relics, or take Stability Tokens.

Tokens may be offered at the Heart Cores.

What you offer will decide who stands when the Abyssal Vein surges.

Remember:

Power taken for yourself strengthens your arm.

Power offered to the Heart strengthens the city.

When the final night comes, only what is stabilized will endure.
